title: Citi Guatemala Presents Financial Solutions to Promote Business with China
summary: Guatemala City - Citi Guatemala and the China-Guatemala Chamber of Cooperation and Trade joined forces recently to present "Interacting with the Asian Giant," a seminar about services and tools the bank offers for doing business directly with China.
tag-1: Citi Guatemala Presents Financial Solutions to Promote Business with China
tag-3: Guatemala City – Citi Guatemala and the China-Guatemala Chamber of Cooperation and Trade joined forces recently to present "Interacting with the Asian Giant," a seminar about services and tools the bank offers for doing business directly with China.
tag-4: The breakfast seminar was held at the capital's Intercontinental Hotel and attended by more than 150 clients representing different Guatemalan companies. The panelists included experts in foreign trade and currency negotiations.
tag-6: "Guatemala currently has a positive context for business development, and we know that promoting commercial exchanges with China represents a growth opportunity for Guatemalan companies," noted Bernardo Chacin, General Manager of Citi Guatemala.
tag-7: "Through this type of event we want to let people know about the global treasury and cash management solutions that Citi offers for conducting business directly with China."
tag-8: With a presence dating back more than 110 years in China and 200 years at the global level, Citi stands out for its presence in more than 100 countries. It even has a regional hub in Hong Kong to serve the needs of its clients around the world.
tag-9: New Latin American Trade Desk in China
tag-10: During the event, the director of Citi Guatemala also announced the recent launch of the bank's new Latin American trade desk in China, based in Shanghai. The new commercial office helps link Citi's Latin American clients with Asia.
